2025-10-06.content: Upgrade Tekton version to 1.3.2 and modify 'kf doctor' behavior and label selectors for pods to work with this Tekton version

summary.title: Tekton Upgrade
summary.summary: Tekton version has been upgraded to 1.3.2. This includes modifications to 'kf doctor' behavior and label selectors for pods to ensure compatibility with the new Tekton version.
